meanings.definition: Having the most muscle mass or strength.
meanings.sent1: He was the muscliest person in the gym, lifting the heaviest weights effortlessly.
meanings.sent2: The bodybuilder's arms were the muscliest I had ever seen.
meanings.sent3: The muscliest guy in town could probably lift a car with one hand!
meanings.sent4: Her determination was the muscliest muscle of all, propelling her to victory.
meanings.sent5: The muscliest dog in the pack led the others with ease.

meanings.definition: In a manner that shows the most muscle definition or tone.
meanings.sent1: He flexed his arms muscliest during the bodybuilding competition.
meanings.sent2: She posed muscliest during the fitness photoshoot, showcasing her toned physique.
meanings.sent3: The superhero moved muscliest when saving the day, impressing everyone with his strength.
meanings.sent4: The music pumped through his veins, making him dance muscliest at the party.
meanings.sent5: The engine roared muscliest as the car sped down the track.
